---
order: 1
title: 容错处理
---

加载失败显示图像占位符。

```jsx
import React from 'react'
import ReactDOM from 'react-dom'
import { Image } from '@kdcloudjs/kdesign'

const Demo: React.FC = () => {
  return (
    <Image
      width={142}
      src="error"
      fallback="data:image/jpeg;base64,"
    />
  )
}

ReactDOM.render(<Demo />, mountNode)
```
